sources.name: DelimitedText45
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DelimitedText45

sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		Product as string,
		{Discount Band} as string,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Manufacturing Price} as decimal(19,4),
		{Sale Price} as decimal(19,4),
		{Gross Sales} as decimal(19,4),
		Discounts as decimal(19,4),
		{ Sales} as decimal(19,4),
		COGS as decimal(19,4),
		Profit as decimal(19,4),
		Date as timestamp,
		{Month Number} as double,
		{Month Name} as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DelimitedText45 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://storagenicrosub.blob.core.windows.net/bolbstoragemicrosub/incompatiablerows.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DelimitedText45,
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(Source, {"salary"}, {{"Count", each Table.RowCount(_), type number}}),
  #"Inserted conditional column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Grouped rows", "Custom", each if [salary] = "80000" then 1 else 0)
in
  #"Inserted conditional column";
